title: Smart Roller Shade 100% Blackout, Motorized Shade Compatible with Alexa Google, App Control Blind for Window, Cordless Free Stop Blind Customized Size (Fabric Grey)

bsr.category: Home & Kitchen
Roller Window Shades Date First Available July

bullets: 【Luxury Woven Blackout Fabric】Upgrade your home with 100% blackout fabric. Designed with a double-sided fabric finish for a modern look, it completely blocks harsh sunlight, protects privacy, and shields against UV rays. Keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer. Perfect for living rooms, offices, or patio sliding doors. The cordless design is child- and pet-safe for peace of mind.

【Remote Control Options】Enjoy hassle-free control right out of the box—each shade is preset with limit positions before shipment, so it’s ready to use upon installation. Choose individual or group control with our programmable remotes. Set and recall your favorite positions with ease. Available in 6-channel or 16-channel fine-tuning remotes. The 6-channel remote and wall switch feature a digital screen with scheduling and timer functions for added convenience.

【Bluetooth Rechargeable Motor】Control your shades directly from the Smart Life App via Bluetooth—no hub required. Ideal for those who prefer simple, local app control within a 90 ft range. Pair with a smart bridge to unlock full smart home features, including Alexa and Google Home voice commands, automation routines, and sunrise/sunset scheduling.

【Hardwired Motor】Perfect for remodels or new builds with reserved outlets. This motor connects directly to Alexa and Google Home for seamless voice and app control. Enjoy continuous power with no need to recharge, plus full smart control from anywhere—including group adjustments and precise percentage positioning.

【Custom-Made Shades】Click “Customize Now” to create blinds tailored to your space. If any components arrive damaged, send us photos within 15 days for a free replacement. We also provide long-term technical support to ensure your shades keep running smoothly.
